name: If Jet Got a Girlfriend
description:
"The professor has gone missing. Jet the robot receives her distress signal and heads off with his girlfriend, Emilia, to save her. However, his condition in return for saving her is...?"

A short RPG made in 7 days for the first /vrpg/ game jam. Features some NSFW dialogue but nothing visual in that regard. Playtime is around 30 minutes or so if you do all the battles.
